parameters.jsCode:
const data = $json;

const customFieldsJson = JSON.stringify(data.custom_fields);

return [{json: {
  filepath: data.filepath,
  filename: data.filename,
  title: data.filename.replace('.pdf', ''),
  document_type: data.document_type,
  correspondent: data.correspondent,
  tags: data.tags.join(','),
  custom_fields_json: customFieldsJson,
  // Individual fields for display
  invoice_number: data.custom_fields.invoice_number || '',
  variable_symbol: data.custom_fields.variable_symbol || '',
  amount: data.custom_fields.amount || '',
  ico: data.custom_fields.ico || '',
  dic: data.custom_fields.dic || '',
  issue_date: data.custom_fields.issue_date || '',
  due_date: data.custom_fields.due_date || '',
  account_number: data.custom_fields.account_number || '',
  period: data.custom_fields.period || '',
  contract_number: data.custom_fields.contract_number || ''
}}];
